actions.name: Ice Dew

cost.trigger: The user is hit by an Ice-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by an Ice-Type attack.

Effect: The triggering attack deals no damage and the user does not suffer any of its effects. The user gains +1 ATK and SPATK for 3 Activations.

system.description:

Effect: The triggering attack deals no damage and the user does not suffer any of its effects. The user gains +1 ATK and SPATK for 3 Activations.
